Name: CONSTRUCT
About the game: 'CONSTRUCT' is a game where two constructors battle it out for the title, 'Best Builder'. In this game you place blocks in order to gain high ground against your opponent. Play with many Power-Ups as well as 4 MODES! Watch out for AIRBOMBS! Think of MULTIPLE STRATEGIES! Outsmart your opponent with many POWERUPS! Play in FOUR MODES! (Normal, Race, Lifegrab, Midas ... and MORE SOON!) Go against a CPU or a friend on the couch with Local Play! Use your wits and dominate the battle for the title, 'Best Builder'!
